name: BrickMan and the Wrapping of Gifts
name_original: BrickMan and the Wrapping of Gifts
description:
This is is just a little sandbox I've made so everyone could have some laughs with the designs they make. There is one Easter egg so give it your best to find it (duly noted that it is Christmas season). The game has no challenge whatsoever other than the player trying their imagination. I wanted to emulate my experience when i was younger where i would mostly like the toys for their parts, not for their sets. I originally intended in joining this jam with my friends,  though due to some shortcomings this became an entirely solo project. This being my first entry in any jam makes me feel really proud of the project and of what I've learned while making it. Hope everyone who plays it enjoys it and i hope to participate in many more game jams.

THANKS FOR ALL THE FOLKS FROM EXTRA CREDITS FOR THIS WONDERFUL OPPORTUNITY!

Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam
